short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabtics helps you improve on health & productivity and gets you beautiful images everytime you open up a new tab in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Tabtics we want you to get a little heads-up on your health and productivity every time you open up a new tab. We help you quickly display stats from your wearable — if you like — and will also give you some tailored health & productivity tips or motivational quotes every now and then. All served on unique and beautiful backgrounds.

Features
* Inspiring photography as a background, a new wallpaper twice per hour
* See the time & weather for your location
* Get helpful health & productivity tips
* Use with your Fitbit to see more relevant tips (optional)

Tabtics was born recently. We'd like to add additional integrations and improve on contextual and personal tips.

Help & Feedback
There's a lot of features and ways to improve Tabtics. We'd like you to share what you'd like to see in addition. We're user focussed and will continue based on feedback.

Follow us at @gettabtics and send us a Tweet or DM, or drop an e-mail at tabtics@grible.co.

Updated in the latest version
* Toggle between Celsius and Fahrenheit by clicking the temperature
* Toggle between 12-hour and 24-hour clock by clicking the time
